code: import apiClient from'./client';class DepartmentService{async getDepartments(){const response=await apiClient.get('/v1/departments');return response.data;}async getDepartmentsByCompany(companyId){const response=await apiClient.get("/v1/departments/company/".concat(companyId));return response.data;}async getDepartmentById(id){const response=await apiClient.get("/v1/departments/".concat(id));return response.data;}async createDepartment(departmentData){const response=await apiClient.post('/v1/departments',departmentData);return response.data;}async updateDepartment(id,departmentData){const response=await apiClient.put("/v1/departments/".concat(id),departmentData);return response.data;}async deleteDepartment(id){await apiClient.delete("/v1/departments/".concat(id));}}const departmentService=new DepartmentService();export default departmentService;
